headline.main: AIR CAMERA MAN A HERO; Records Aerial Battle Over the Reich From Flying Fortress Top

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 2 (U.P.) -- The War Department revealed today the remarkable feat of an Army Air Force camera man who photographed one of the fiercest aerial battles of the war from the top of a Flying Fortress thousands of feet over Germany.
abstract: heroism of Tech Sgt Browning in photographing US raid on Regensburg, Ger, Aug 17, reptd
snippet: WASHINGTON, Nov. 2 (U.P.) -- The War Department revealed today the remarkable feat of an Army Air Force camera man who photographed one of the fiercest aerial battles of the war from the top of a Flying Fortress thousands of feet over Germany....
